title: Director-Class AI: Ethical Singularity Engine â€” Layer 16 of the SCPN Framework
description: A prototype implementation of Layer 16 (The Director) of the Self-Consistent Phenomenological Network (SCPN) Framework. Introduces a recursive Strange Loop architecture to AGI with dual-entropy oversight (logical via NLI, factual via RAG), a Backfire Kernel hardware interlock, and the Consilium ethical functional for autonomous decision-making under entropy constraints.
notes: Part of the SCPN (Self-Consistent Phenomenological Network) research framework by ANULUM. Layer 16 provides recursive ethical oversight for AGI systems.
